converter.parser:
<xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="document"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" />
<xsl:variable name="opendate" select="content[@name='matter_open_date']" /> <xsl:variable name="closedate" select="content[@name='matter_close_date']" /> <content name="closedate"> <xsl:value-of select="$closedate" /> </content>
<xsl:variable name="opendateinsecond" select="viv:parse-date($opendate)" /> <xsl:variable name="closedateinsecond" select="viv:parse-date($closedate)" /> <xsl:variable name="todaydate"> <xsl:value-of select="viv:parse-date(date:date-time())" /> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="differenceindays"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$closedate != '' and $closedate != NULL"> <xsl:value-of select="round((number($closedateinsecond) - number($opendateinsecond)) div 86400)" /> </xsl:when>
<xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="round((number($todaydate) - number($opendateinsecond)) div 86400)" /> </xsl:otherwise>
</xsl:choose>
</xsl:variable>
<content name="case_length_bucket">
<xsl:choose>
<xsl:when test="number($differenceindays) < 91"><![CDATA[ 0-90 ]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:when test="number($differenceindays) < 181 and number($differenceindays) > 90"><![CDATA[ 91-180 ]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:when test="number($differenceindays) < 366 and number($differenceindays) > 180"><![CDATA[ 181-365 ]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:when test="number($differenceindays) < 549 and number($differenceindays) > 366"><![CDATA[ 366-548 ]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:otherwise><![CDATA[ 559 and up ]]></xsl:otherwise>
</xsl:choose>
</content>
</xsl:copy> </xsl:template>

declare.name: staging

call-function.name: vse-crawler-seed-database-key-sql
call-function.with: <category name="com.ibm.dataexplorer.connectors.db"> <priority value="debug" /> </category> <category name="com.ibm.dataexplorer.connectors"> <priority value="debug" /> </category> <category name="com.vivisimo.libmisc.XMLSocket.XMLFeed"> <priority value="off" /> </category> <root> <priority value="debug" /> <appender-ref ref="FILE" /> </root> <appender name="FILE" class="org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender"> <param name="MaxBackupIndex" value="9" /> <param name="MaximumFileSize" value="10000000" /> <param name="File" value="%LOGDIR%/viv_connector-%T-%N.log" /> <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout"> <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%d [%t] %-5p %c %m%n" /> </layout> </appender>

converter.parser:
<xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="document"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" />
<xsl:variable name="opendate" select="content[@name='matter_open_date']" /> <xsl:variable name="closedate" select="content[@name='matter_close_date']" /> <xsl:variable name="dormancydate" select="content[@name='dormancy_date']" /> <content name="closedate"> <xsl:value-of select="$closedate" /> </content>
<xsl:variable name="opendateinsecond" select="viv:parse-date($opendate)" /> <xsl:variable name="closedateinsecond" select="viv:parse-date($closedate)" /> <xsl:variable name="dormancydateinsecond" select="viv:parse-date($dormancydate)" />
<xsl:variable name="dataloaddate"> <xsl:value-of select="viv:parse-date('15-May-2017')" /> </xsl:variable>
<content name="dormancy_days"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="not($dormancydate)"><![CDATA[0]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="round((number($dataloaddate) - number($dormancydateinsecond)) div 86400)" /> </xsl:otherwise>
</xsl:choose>
<!--xsl:value-of select="round((number($dataloaddate) - number($dormancydateinsecond)) div 86400)" /--> </content>
<xsl:variable name="todaydate"> <xsl:value-of select="viv:parse-date(date:date-time())" /> </xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="differenceindays"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$closedate != ''"> <xsl:value-of select="round((number($closedateinsecond) - number($opendateinsecond)) div 86400)" /> </xsl:when>
<xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="round((number($todaydate) - number($opendateinsecond)) div 86400)" /> </xsl:otherwise>
</xsl:choose>
</xsl:variable>
<content name="case_length"> <xsl:value-of select="$differenceindays" /> </content>
<content name="case_length_bucket">
<xsl:choose>
<xsl:when test="number($differenceindays) < 91"><![CDATA[ 0-90 ]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:when test="number($differenceindays) < 181 and number($differenceindays) > 90"><![CDATA[ 91-180 ]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:when test="number($differenceindays) < 366 and number($differenceindays) > 180"><![CDATA[ 181-365 ]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:when test="number($differenceindays) < 549 and number($differenceindays) > 366"><![CDATA[ 366-548 ]]></xsl:when>
<xsl:otherwise><![CDATA[ 559 and up ]]></xsl:otherwise>
</xsl:choose>
</content>
</xsl:copy> </xsl:template>

call-function.name: vse-crawler-seed-database-key-sql
call-function.with: <category name="com.ibm.dataexplorer.connectors.db"> <priority value="debug" /> </category> <category name="com.ibm.dataexplorer.connectors"> <priority value="debug" /> </category> <category name="com.vivisimo.libmisc.XMLSocket.XMLFeed"> <priority value="off" /> </category> <root> <priority value="debug" /> <appender-ref ref="FILE" /> </root> <appender name="FILE" class="org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender"> <param name="MaxBackupIndex" value="9" /> <param name="MaximumFileSize" value="10000000" /> <param name="File" value="%LOGDIR%/viv_connector-%T-%N.log" /> <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout"> <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%d [%t] %-5p %c %m%n" /> </layout> </appender>

converter.parser:
<xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="document"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <xsl:variable name="itemdate" select="content[@name='item_date']" /> <xsl:variable name="opendate" select="content[@name='matter_open_date']" /> <xsl:variable name="trialdate" select="content[@name='trial_date']" />
<xsl:variable name="closedate" select="content[@name='matter_close_date']" /> <xsl:variable name="timekeeperrate" select="content[@name='timekeeper_rate']" /> <content name="closedate"> <xsl:value-of select="$closedate" /> </content> <xsl:variable name="trialdateinseconds" select="viv:parse-date($trialdate)" />

<xsl:variable name="daysfromstartvariable"> <xsl:value-of select="round((number($itemdateinsecond) - number($opendateinsecond)) div 86400)" /> </xsl:variable> <content name="numberofdayssincematteropen"> <xsl:value-of select="$daysfromstartvariable" /> </content> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="number($daysfromstartvariable) > 0 and number($daysfromstartvariable) < 31"> <content name="daysfromstart"><![CDATA[0-30]]></content> <content name="daysfromstart"><![CDATA[0-60]]></content> <content name="daysfromstart"><![CDATA[0-90]]></content> <content name="daysfromstart"><![CDATA[0-120]]></content> <content name="daysfromstart"><![CDATA[0-150]]></content> <content name="daysfromstart"><![CDATA[0-180]]></content> <content name="daysfromstart"><![CDATA[0-270]]></content> <content name="daysfromstart"><![CDATA[0-365]]></content> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose>

call-function.name: vse-crawler-seed-database-key-sql
call-function.with: <category name="com.ibm.dataexplorer.connectors.db"> <priority value="debug" /> </category> <category name="com.ibm.dataexplorer.connectors"> <priority value="debug" /> </category> <category name="com.vivisimo.libmisc.XMLSocket.XMLFeed"> <priority value="off" /> </category> <root> <priority value="debug" /> <appender-ref ref="FILE" /> </root> <appender name="FILE" class="org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender"> <param name="MaxBackupIndex" value="9" /> <param name="MaximumFileSize" value="10000000" /> <param name="File" value="%LOGDIR%/viv_connector-%T-%N.log" /> <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout"> <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%d [%t] %-5p %c %m%n" /> </layout> </appender>
